name: May's Perfect Romance
description:
Girl Mei has never met guys. She has no friends and she almost always sits at home. Despite the fact that she has long wanted to start dating someone, she is not at all ready to endure even the slightest flaws of her partner.
 
But since there are no ideal people, she decided to create her own, in which only the advantages of the best guys will be combined.

This is a 3rd person dating simulator about a girl decided to piece together the perfect guy do it yourself. To do this she needs to enter trust in six guys like them and then kill them and choose the most beautiful part of their bodies.

  • You're controlling May in third person view.
  • Use your PC to flirt with guys and plan dates.
  • In order to get into trust in them, find out their preferences in food, music, clothing, cinema. In anything!
  • Kill them silently.
  • Do not get caught by police.
  • Make May's Ideal boyfriend from body parts.
  • Be sure he's stays with you after creating.
